name: Amy h
review: I have allergies and while I try not to rub my eyes, I have issues with my mascara smudging (even smudge-proof ones). I've been using this mascara for over a year with no issues! It's not the best lengthening or volumizing mascara, but it does a good job without going everywhere.

name: E
review: I love that this is an all in one. Dislike that it often clumps when applying and I have to separate the lashes.

name: Katherine
review: I never ever review products but I felt as if I needed to review this mascara especially after seeing the bad reviews! My eyelashes are the most important part of my makeup routine and this is my favorite mascara I've used. My eyelashes look amazing!

name: Jen
review: This product is horrible. The product does lengthen lashes, but your lashes get clumped and it looks fake. The mascara makes your lashes feel stiff, like they will break any second. The bristle is small and doesn't work. Overall, I would not buy again.

name: Kathy
review: I truly believe that Revlon cannot make a good mascara.  Forget this one.  It looks like you have no mascara on, you cannot layer it, it doesn't volumnize or lengthen.  A waste of money.

name: Ari
review: It's a great product

name: Ang
review: Its great

name: Lanie
review: So I gave this a bad review a while back, and I have come to a drastic change of opinion. Back in the day, the brush had a raisin-shape, oval and flat at the same time, with a reservoir to hold/distribute product. A good idea, but the logistics didn't work, for me anyhow. So I found some in another retailer, and bought one for my daughter and she popped it open and immediately noticed the brush. See, she was in the last episode of Me and My Mascara, and she had the same issues. Well now the brush is kinda football-shaped and it works exponentially better as I have Short-Sparse Syndrome. I am now in love and let Revlon know it. This is good!

name: TS_92
review: I wanted to like this product. I thought that if I used it enough, I'd warm up to it. It may be the worst mascara I have ever used. The brush doesn't separate your lashes. It's like applying mascara using your fingers – the brush just has absolutely no grip because the bristles (which also break off) are so small. The formula is also a strange consistency of goopy and runny. Don't buy this.

name: RLB
review: Love the small brush/wand. I use one by MAC that has the same type of brush/wand. Glad to find this one at a better price.

name: EJ
review: Love the way it helps my eyes look natural but defined

name: Karen
review: Love it.

name: JustStacey1022
review: Everyday long, lush lashes!!!

name: Bonnie
review: Do Not Like this product at all the brush is ridiculously small

name: Bonnie
review: Brush is way too small - not enough product on the brush and since its tiny it makes it even worse.

name: Magic
review: Not good, cheap brush, mascara is weak, you have to keep applying and still doesn't create a nice lash.

name: AppTrail girl
review: Have always liked Revlon mascara. Perhaps I was doing something wrong, but the brush was horrible. Very short rubber bristles. Returned to Ulta for the classic brush.

name: Kaci
review: The brush is tiny and covered in liquid. It clumped my lashes together every time I applied it. Very disappointing!

name: Maureen
review: I thought it was going to be an everyday kind of brush but it was not easy to use and caused clumps and it was not easy to fix

name: Marina MUA
review: I love how long it makes my eyelashes look and it fans them out.

name: Liz
review: The mascara goes on a little thick/clumpy but looks good once I take some time to put it on. After wearing for a few hours, it starts to flake off and leaves pieces under my eye.

name: kk
review: The brush is not good at all, I don't know how many times I smudged my make up because of how much the brush causes the product to clump.

name: kk
review: Its ok I just wanted to try something different but I guess ill stick to the powder liner.

name: Valentina
review: I bought this thinking it would be an incredible mascara, but instead it was super drying, flaked off after about 2 hours and super irritating to my eyes/eyelashes. Not their best product!

name: Xx
review: Xx

name: Kris
review: The tiny brush is basically a plastic q-tip holding mascara...applies either nothing or globs.  Since it does not have brush bristles to separate lashes, it clumps them together.  Tarantula-legs-eyes.

name: amber
review: terrible I am going to return this aweful product

name: Hairgodess
review: Applied alright. I bought this mascera specifically for the brush. It worked okay, nothing special. It did clump quite a bit. It felt nice when it dried at 8am, but by 2pm my lashes feel gross, waxy and oily like. By 5pm it's flaking off and of course getting in my eyes which causes irritation. Would not buy this mascera again. I've been using it for 3 weeks and debating on just throwing it out.

name: L
review: The applicator is a good length keeps my eyelashes separated and doesn't clump.

name: Madi914
review: Probably the worst mascara I have ever tried. The wand is terrible and the mascara its self is extremely clumpy. I threw it away after one use.

name: Clo
review: The packaging and the exterior of the product is actually one of my favorites but the applicator is too small. This  means that you have to do multiple brush strokes to get a good amount of product and it ends up looking clumpy. The product itself is okay and easy to wash away but it seems like you are paying more for the exterior than the brush and the product.

name: Not a fan
review: I only used a few times and then discarded.  It clumped and did none of the things it claimed.  I always use another brand and will definitely go back to it.

name: Buttercup
review: This mascara is difficult to work with and after a couple coats, your lashes look spidery!  The brush is weird and too small.

name: Mama
review: I love Revlon but this is the hardest brush I have ever used. I do not like it at all. I wish I would have chose one of their other mascaras. Very hard to use.

name: LP
review: Too clumpy

name: Yoda
review: I had trouble with this one. The mascara itself does exactly what they say it will. Goes on without clumps, gives you nice length and volume. However, WHO thought that tiny nonexistent brush was a good idea? A bad addition to an otherwise good product.

name: CathMH
review: I tried this mascara on four different occasions and regretted it every time.  The brush is small and easy to control, but there is a ton of product on it.  My lashes all stick together.  No added length or volume...unless you count my 5 fat eyelashes that I try to comb apart.  I wouldn't recommend this product and threw it away.

name: Rheandra
review: I tried this for the first time and couldn't see myself ever using it again. I'm a fan of more separated, soft looking lashes. This made my lashes clumpy and spikey.

name: Minnie
review: It does NOT lengthen whatsoever. It adds some definition and color but that's it. Does not work as advertised. Maybelline Lots of Lashes is cheaper and works 10X better. Wish I wouldn't have spent the money.

name: casino mary
review: I only use my mascara when I go out.I like the way it wears on my newly grown thin eyelashes adds length and some volume.I really don't have anything negative to say about it.

name: Areala
review: The Best Mascara Makes You Look Like You Aren't Wearing Any

name: Dani
review: Didn't like the brush, flakes off during the day, smudges

name: tater tots
review: Well I bought the Red Revlon mascara because I was told it would do everything I wanted done, like to lenghten my lashes, volumize them, and not have them pushed and clamped together, and it did most of those thing I really just have a problem with the brush, it was WAY to small and it didn't really seem to make a difference in my lashes.. I would probably only recommed it to someone who doesn't like long lashes.

name: Sad Pam
review: It clumped putting it on and not a fan of the brush at all!  Then during the day it kept flaking!  Use to use Revlon Grow lush and loved it!!  Needed more and it was gone and this was its replacement

name: Ulta babe
review: Flakey

name: Ulta babe
review: Flakey

name: Sandra
review: Flake, clump, flake, clump. If that's what you're looking for then waste your money on this product. Was so bad, I returned it. Wish i could give it zero stars.No more Revlon for me.

name: dee
review: This mascara makes it look like you're wearing false lashes. You have to be careful when applying, it tends to clump lashes together. But when applied carefully, looks amazing.

name: obsessed with mascaras
review: Let me preface this by saying that, for ME, "one coat" is pulling the wand out and using the brush until there's really no formula left. With that being said, this mascara provides intense, thick, long, and extremely curled lashes after only one coat. I don't use an eyelash curler and this mascara curled my lashes so much that they were practically pointing straight up. It does dry relatively quickly but that doesn't bother me because I don't start on my other eye's lashes until I'm completely done with the first one, and I also don't delay between coats. I seriously didn't expect the result. I will say, I absolutely despise the size of the wand, it makes putting on mascara an even lengthier process than it already is.

name: xoxoxoxoxoxo
review: This flakes terribly and leaves "dirt" all over my cheeks after a couple hours. My 7 year old asked me why my face is so dirty when I started wearing this mascara. FLAKES like crazy!! I want to return it.

name: none
review: Returned it, certainly didn't make a big difference in my lashes

name: Autumn
review: I use this mascara everyday and I love how well it fits in with my natural look

name: Swirlysommer
review: This mascara does nothing it says.  Did not lengthen and no volume.  Just added a black coating to my lashes and that is it.  Started to flake about 1hr later and was getting in my eyes all day.

name: amberlea
review: I use this but have to use a different wand to comb out the clumps. Don't waists your money.

name: Kenz
review: I don't like the application of this mascara. It doesn't go on very well and I regret gutting it

name: Cassie
review: The color is bold which is always a plus. I was not a fan though, anything that refers to itself as "ultimate" I presume is going to be amazing..... The product did nothing to lengthen or add volume to my lashes. I prefer the Ulta brand of volumizing mascara.  However I tried it due to the coupon.

name: sandraz
review: I bought this product because I received a coupon to try it for $4 (from Walgreen's). I use Chanel Le Volume mascara because I have very fine thin short lashes. I refuse to pay $20+ for a mascara primer. My lashes are definitely thicker in the summer time but Chicago winters are cold and my lashes seem to be thinner so I need a little extra help even with high quality mascara. This mascara does do that for me, I use it first as a primer then build my Chanel mascara on that and sometimes even go back to Revlon for some added definition. So for me, the small brush and the formula works well. And is much cheaper than primer. I gave it 4 stars because I just started using it and I want to see how it holds up over time.

name: Sarah G
review: I was drawn in by all the claims on the packaging for a mascara that does it all....and was greatly disappointed. The brush is so small and the formula so wet that it smeared all over my lid even with careful application, which took forever with such a teeny, tiny brush. I can't express enough how disappointed I was in this product.

name: Sheena
review:
I love love everything about this mascara and felt I finally found the perfect one! My problem with this product is it causes major flaking after 4-5 hours. Iv never had a mascara do this like this one. I'm very disappointed that I'll no longer get to rock my amazing lashes(due to effect of product) with this product due to major
flaking of it.

name: Amanda the Ironwoman
review: Tiny brush reaches a lot of lashes, but it seems easy to apply too much product.  The tiny bristles are easily coated in too much product.

name: M in the Big Dallas
review: This mascara has amazing packaging but nothing amazing inside. I wouldn't buy this again and plan to return this product to Ulta because it doesn't do anything great. Essentially, it makes your lashes black. Nothing else.

name: Kat
review: Was using Revlon Lash Potion mascara and really liked it. Don't know if they still make it as I cannot find it at my usual stores any more. So I tried this new Revlon mascara and do not like it at all. Doesn't give any volume and it clumps.

name: Hana
review: Contrary to most of the reviews, I really like this mascara! I was hesitant to use such a small brush with such short bristles, but I am pleasantly surprised with its performance. This mascara darkens, defines and volumizes my little Asian lashes. I do have to do a comb-through between each layer for a little separation, but I have to do that with 90% of mascaras I use.

name: Dana
review: I was super excited to try out a new mascara but this one is a horrible mascara. I found the wand extremely difficult to use since it is very small and has way too much product on it. With only one coat my lashes had clumped together then later in the day it started to flake off. Would not use this again. Don't spend your money on this mascara.

name: Nanda
review: Clumpy, flakey, and just horrible and it leaves your lashes looking horrible and heavy!!

name: laura
review: very natural looking mascara and takes forever to built up and get my lashes look like theres anything there due to the very small wand. I'll use it for my bottom lashes.

name: AmberW
review: Bought all the new mascaras and this one was the worst! Didn't add anything but clumps.

name: mandy mua
review: This mascara is AMAZING! It comes in a close second to my Loreal voluminous. The small wand makes for really precise application and as far as clumping, as with any other mascara, you may have to wipe off excess product in the want before applying. It is great at lengthening and separating my lashes. A total WIN!

name: mom_of_2_79
review: I was so excited to try this product based on the most of the good reviews I found.  I have never found a revlon mascara that worked well, but I saw they had a whole new line and thought I would give it a try.  The concept of the mascara is nice, and the wand does seem to get those hard to reach lashes.  I had an issue with too much product on the wand and my wand bristles had strange little fibers that I had to pull off before applying.. Once I tried applying it, the mascara got on my eyelids and even on my contact in my eye.  I dont know if I got a bad mascara, but it did not work out for me at all.  I just bought it yesterday, so I am going to see if I can return it and go back to something else.

name: Mel
review: When I first put it on, I liked the length and volume it gave.  It has small fibers which add to your lashes.  BUT... It flakes off badly onto my cheeks, so much worse than any other mascara I've tried, and after only a few hours.  By the end of the day, there isn't any left on the lashes.  Maybe if I kept applying it periodically throughout the day, but its not worth it.  Also, the hollow brush holds a lot of extra clumpy product, it is difficult to apply without smudging your lash line with clumps of mascara.  The bristles on the brush are incredibly short, which is why you need to be very precise.  Great idea, not good finished beauty product.

name: knaves70
review: this stuff is a joke, (like most mascaras) over priced and makes a huge mess of my eyelashes. It's over priced and a waste of money. I'll stick to my cheap mascara!

name: Hb
review: Ok

name: QueenC
review: I was looking forward to Revlon's all in one mascara, I thought it would be an awesome time saver. I have used Revlon products in the past and I have never been disappointed until now. This is the absolute worst mascara I have ever used, which is saying something because I enjoy trying new kinds of mascara and I seldom buy the same one twice. For starters, it clumps, big time, I always spent several minutes separating my lashes, which had to be done very quickly because this stuff dries super fast. The wand comes out with an excessive amount of mascara on it and the more you try to thin it out, the worse it seems to get. It is very stubborn to remove, it flakes a little, and it's very sticky, it reminds me of Elmer'so school glue.  I would not recommend this to anyone. I used it for 2 weeks, and it never got better. The only positive thing about it is, it is affordable. Overall, it's a total nightmare.

name: Chan
review: Hate the brush. I also bought the dramatic one but I might return it. I hate the brush.

name: valtexas
review: The wand is way too little and does not separate lashes. I have thin straight lashes and did not work with this wand or formula

name: Nurse4life
review: Thought I could go with a less expensive mascara, nope, will go back to my original

name: Amy
review: Really struggled to remove this mascara even though it was flaking everywhere! Managed to pull out half of my own lashes trying to remove it

name: CS
review: The tiny bristles came off the brush and got into my eyes. There are more bristles in the tube than on the brush. I think the mascara is good but the brush has defects.

name: Joy
review: This is probably the worst mascara product I have ever used. The brush is very small and the mascara is very clumpy. With the smaller brush you need to use more strokes which causes more clumps and appears horrible. Then it flakes about 10 hours after wear. I feel the package/product name is false advertisement. Stay away from this product

name: Daniela
review: Great product to give your lashes length. Brush is small but able to reach top/bottom lashes perfectly

name: Amy
review: Wasn't sure when I first pulled the wand out of the tube. There are virtually no teeth or bristles on the the brush. But to my surprise, it really did define my eyelashes very well.

name: Lulu
review: I did not like this product. The brush is not good for lengthening short lashes. Clumped together

name: Jo from Spokane
review: Bought this thinking it would add volume to my lashes.  No!  The brush is tiny, runs and smudges.

name: Jessica
review: I thought this was the ABSOLUTE WORST mascara I have ever purchased.

name: Jlover
review: This is a good mascara that adds volume, separates, and lengthens. It doesn't clump or flake I just wish the brush was a little bit bigger. It also comes off easily with makeup remover.

name: Dani
review: It fulfills what it promised

name: Martha
review: I don't have anything good to say about this mascara.  It is the clumpiest stuff I have ever tried.  The brush is horrible. Tried to use it twice and ended up throwing it in the garbage.

name: Angie
review: I did not like it at all. I have allergies meaning my eyes are always runny but I've never had a "drug store" cosmetics run or come off as easily as this one. Definitely not worth the money. It also clumps your eyelashes and the brush is really small and the mascara flakes of on your lashes

name: Lanie
review: If I could give ZERO STARS, I would have. I tried it so many different ways, I tried it warm, I tried it room temp, I washed the brush, I swiped the brush, I used a mascara comb, I asked my daughter to try it and she is a genius at making unwieldy things work and she could not make it do right. So then I GAVE UP! I would not make my worst enemy use this. It sticks, it is difficult to get a good sweep of product because it clumps all over to where I have like three huge lashes. If I'd wanted to look like Betty Boop I'd have gone to my great-grandma's Vaseline + lampblack. Revlon.....you only have one job: make good makeup. DO BETTER.

name: Katieq
review: I really like this mascara especially the plastic brush! I tend to buy the expensive ones at the makeup counters. The only con is I wish the brush was longer. Other then that good product!!

name: bbb
review: I know it's not expensive but I've used drug store brands before with better results. I won't be purchasing this again. It does not do anything it claims to do.

name: H Yoshida
review: sticky, very very VERY hard to remove, I had tried removing with three different makeup removers and it was so stubborn, won't remove until you pull out some of your eyelashes, never use again

name: Luckyme13
review: This is the perfect wear to the (your) eyes...anytime.

name: Sarah
review: Brush doesn't coat evenly

name: Sara
review: This is quite possibly the worst mascara I have ever used.  It goes on so thick and clumpy, but worst of all, within an hour of applying it begins to FLAKE and then FLAKES ALL DAY!  Horrible product!

name: Mljohnson
review: I got this product for Christmas and was very excited about it. The first few times I used it I noticed lots of flaking under my eyes but was also using a dark eyeshadow and wasn't sure how the culprit was so I decided to just apply the mascara. It definitely was the mascara. The brush is also hard to use as it's so small and whenever I try to get close to the lash line I end up poking my eye. Definitely won't buy again.

name: mollypockit
review: The tiny brush has divers in it as a lash deposit, but the bristles on the brush are basically nonexistent. I found that the I put it on it took forever to dry and it clumped my lashes. Definitely not the "all in one" mascara I was looking for.

name: DJ
review: Quite possibly the worst mascara I have ever used. Clumps terribly, brush does not separate lashes, does not lengthen, does NOT come off easily. Absolutely awful. Can't believe it made it past quality control.

name: Ter
review: I wanted to love this product given it's ingredients but it didn't hit the bill.  I'm on the hunt for the perfect mascara - lengthening, separating, no clumps and no flakes - without paying over $30 so this was another of my first 4 choices. This is advertised as their all in one formula but didn't pass muster. Granted I only used it once but it did nothing for my lashes so sadly I'm moving on to the next.

name: Brie
review: The brush was very small and it made my lashes super clumpy. The length and volume were okay and the formula was super wet.

name: Jk
review: I did not like this product at all. The product clumps and makes lashes stick together. One of my least favorite mascaras that I've tried. There are much better products for the same price point.

name: Hannah
review: It didn't do a single thing it advertised. I have short lashes and it made no difference. I am returning this product.

name: HBattick
review: I liked the smaller brush. It made it easy to make sure I got all my lashes and was able to kind of fan out the corner lashes. Unfortunately, I feel like the brush held too much product causing it to clump. It was also flaking off in less than an hour... not for me.

name: k_tina
review: I'm glad I didn't buy this and it only came in a subscription box because this mascara is horrible! It was like taking black paint and slapping it on my eyelashes. It did nothing but clump my lashes together and if I would blink it would end up all over my face. I will be sticking to my covergirl lashblast when it comes to drugstore brand.

name: Mrs G
review: This has to be the worst mascara I've ever tried.  The packaging is sleek and pretty, but that's where it stops.  The brush is overloaded with product upon removal of the wand from the tube.  The mascara clumps on my lashes and by no means does it lengthen or add volume.  Also, the mascara flakes off on my face within 6 hours of applying it.  After 2 days of trying to make this mascara work, it's going in the trash.  Please, don't waste your money.

name: Renee
review: This is a great mascara! I always have bought more expensive ones, but heard a friend talk about this and decided to give it a try. To my surprise it works great. You get great length, volume and separation. The only real downside is the small brush head, but it does do the job it advertised. I am very happy with this product!

name: roknrolgrl
review: More companies need to make a dark brown...tired of all the weird new brushes...guess that is why i go back to maybelline great lash

name: addriiannaa
review:
If i could give it 0 stars i would. This is one of the worst mascaras i have ever used. It basically just slicked on black on my eyelashes. Gave no definition, length, or volume. Once it dried it began to flake off.
Will def. be returning this product.. DO NOT BUY THIS its such a waste of money.

name: rayanne87
review: Wow this is seriously the worst mascara that I have ever used! The mascara wand is small and just clumps the lashes together. You end up with your lashes looking like spider legs. Also end up with black specks on your cheeks from it flaking. Never had such an awful makeup product. This was tossed in the trash, were this mascara belongs!

name: MSN12
review: This mascara doesn't do much, or anything for me really. It flakes all over my face, is really clumpy and kind of hard to work with. However it is quite expensive so I'm obviously going to keep playing with it and seeing what helps.

name: Megan
review: Way too much product comes out on that brush. You'd think tiny brush=more control, but nope. It's messy and doesn't do anything flattering.

name: Nikki
review: I love this mascara. I've seen a lot of hate for the short wand but it's part of why I love this so much, it gives me much better control than any other mascara I've tried.

name: Stephanie
review: This mascara is worse than $3 mascara. Brush is way to small and builds up to much product on it. Once it touches your lashes it's just a blobby mess. I had to use another brush just to try and comb them apart. My lashes feel very dry and crunchy

name: veronica
review: awesome...does literally everything for my lashes. the wand is odd but it works.

name: Steph
review: Flakes off after just a few hours. Won't be using anymore

name: Cass
review: This is an okay mascara, but it won't last you through the day. When I put it on in the morning my lashes look amazing and long, but by noon on a work day I have flakes all underneath my eyes and it hardly looks like there's anything on. The product itself doesn't last very long. I've had it for about 2 months and it's already drying out and clumping. I'm also not a big fan of how small the brush is. I probably won't buy it again, but I'm not one to waste!

name: Grrr
review: Doesn't do what it says it will

name: Nancy
review: It went on great. First time using it

name: Julie
review:
I bought this hoping it would be pretty decent. I usually use Urban Decay Perversion mascara, but this is way cheaper. The formula dried out too quickly for me barely using it and whenever I do use it, I would end up with panda eyes by the end of the day. It also clumps my lashes together which to me, isn't attractive.
I was hoping a new bottle = good product for at least a couple weeks. Nope! I'm better off sticking with shelling out extra money on mascara that lasts infinitely (I've had my UD mascara tube for two-three months now and it still works fine) longer and looks way better.

name: karen
review: i use this product every day and i wear minimal makeup daytimes,more going out and this product can be for day or evening

name: Me
review: This has a terrible brush and you have to go really slow putting it on or you'll have a clumpy mess on your hands.

name: Lynn
review: Works well. Love the little brush

name: Bri
review: Formula is ok, but once it dries it starts to flake after a while. And the brush is difficult to work with. Even when I'm careful, I still manage to poke myself in the eye with the brush.

name: Bsue
review: no matter how much or little I applied it flaked - would not recommend

name: Canotch
review: Clumpy  and flaky

name: Coralcat
review: I really wanted to like this but it flakes constantly all day.  Bummer because it does make your lashes look pretty nice but I cannot get over the flaking. Never experienced anything like this.

name: Kiki
review:
I didn't expect this mascara to have fibers in it to make your lashes longer. I have a problem with my lashes being too long and hitting my eyeglasses, so this made it worse.

Also, the brush made my lashes clumpy. I switched to a regular bristle brush and it's ok, but it still isn't my favorite mascara.

name: blender
review: It defined my lashes without making them look over made up.

name: Nina
review: Did not perform to the discription on the package.

name: Nancy
review: I have extremely long lashes and have issues with most brands making smudges below my eyes - not so with this formula.

name: BEE
review: I bought this in store and it was not the type of brush I was expecting.  It was very very short with almost not there bristles.  The short bristles allowed to mascara to pool in between them and did not provide as much definition as I would have liked.  Had to apply multiple coats for any decent effect.  I would use this mascara in a bind.

name: Logan
review:
I wouldn't recommend this mascara. It often clumps up. The brush just isn't good. It has tiny little spikes that do nothing to separate lashes effectively.

Let's address the five claims... It does add volume and its color is intense, but it absolutely does not lengthen, define, or lift the lashes.

name: Big Eyes
review: Horrible brush  -

name: Mamahonda
review:
I received this mascara for free as part of a special offer. Even for free, it's not worth keeping. When you pull out the brush, it is full of globs of mascara. Even after scraping it numerous times, you still end up with globs on your lashes. After using a lash brush to get these out I went about my day, only to see that the mascara was flaking off. Glad I didn't pay for it. Beware that in the pictures on the Revlon site for this product, the fine print reads that the model's lashes were enhanced with lash fillers. Really Revlon?
Sticking to good old Maybelline pink and green - the best!!

name: Millc124
review: I would not purchase again

name: just me
review:
i havent beenusingm ascaranfor several yearsand wanted to change up my look. i have small, straight lashes so i need help all ways. i bought this on the fly without doing my research online and am very happy... yes, brush is a bit small and product a teeny bit clumpy (easy to smooth out with a second brush thru) but considering that my lashes look quite bit longer and fuller i can deal with the brush/clumps!!

after being away from it for so long and remembering how i used to use several in one sitting to get the look i wanted i thought this was great.

now i will see how it fares through the day...

name: J-mon
review: It did not add volume or length.. sad to say but I'm disappointed.. I had great expectation..

name: Shan
review: Love it and great price

name: JJ
review: I'm used to using lashblast mascaras and thought I'd change it up. This brush head is way smaller than I'm used to, but I could get used to it. Problem is it flakes and doesn't add as much volume as I'd like. The length is great, I wished it separated lashes better too.

name: LeeLee
review: Just started using this product.  Looking for one that works as well several weeks from now as it does new.  Time will tell.

name: Stevie Marie
review: Lengthens well, but it clumps.

name: Nelly
review: V

name: Vonne
review: Can be used for special events, or regular use.

name: sescort69
review: I generally research long and hard about any products I buy before I buy them and went to the store with a product in mind. For some reason (I have no idea why) I chose this one instead hoping it would do what it promised, but prepared to return if not. When I returned home I did research on the back end and what I read made me nervous and expecting to be disappointed when I tried it. However, this (happily) was not the case. I don't know why my experience was different than those who didn't like this, but I am completely satisfied with it in all ways. All I can say is try it for yourself and if you are disappointed take it back, don't throw away money.

name: Vanessa
review: Very nice mascara

name: Carrie
review: Great lengths.

name: Red
review: It flakes, makes my lashes clump together.

name: Sherry
review: The brush is small which is good, but it comes out with globs of mascara on it.

name: RiahT
review: the brush is different,but works

name: Mommy reviewer
review: Won't buy this one again

name: megumi s.
review: I like separated lashes, and although several reviews online said it didn't clump, it definitely does. The idea of a tiny brush was a good start, as it does indeed reach those hard-to-reach inner- and outer-corner lashes without smudges on your lids, but the hollow core has too much product, and the bristles are either too short or too spaced-out, so it doesn't separate lashes. I ended up with my lashes being clumped into 5 thick lashes. Not a good look. Maybe the more specialized ones in the collection that will be coming out later will be better...?

name: cam
review: This mascara goes on beautifully! It has fibers mixed in which helps to build the most incredible length and volume. .. but ... it also flakes worse than any other mascara I have ever tried. After only a few hours I find my cheeks covered in little black spots. So disappointing :(

name: bailey
review: Had a coupon off of revlon and was in need of mascara, so I figured I would try this new one, just for fun. But, it didn't live up to its name. I don't like the wand for one, it has a small applicator, which can be great for precision, but the formula is very thick and clumpy, which just make it too thick for such a tiny wand. It didn't impress me as far as lengthening or volume or anything. I feel like this product was poorly executed.

name: BreaLovesBeauty
review: Ive always struggled with trying to get my short lashes to be lifted full and long until i found this mascara! Gives amazing length, volume, and definition. The only down side is it flakes a bit, but I'm willing to put up with it for the price and how good my lashes look!

name: Tuts
review: Wand is too small. Sticky and stringy. Makes lashes stick together.

name: Ulta Fan
review: Does not lengthen and product clumps on wand.  Was a fan of "Grow Lucious" by Revlon but Ulta does not carry anymore.

name: Sunrise watcher
review: I have to say this is the most impossible mascara! It flakes horribly. Goes on very wet and globby. Forget touching up later in the day because everything applied earlier will fall off and land on your face. Not a good look.

name: Kay
review: This product is very difficult to use the brush is very small and awkwardly shaped. Normally I love Revlon products but this one definitely missed the mark.

name: KATIE
review: Love this mascara. I have tiny short lashes.  You really have to be generous with the application, but what I love most about this mascara, is that most that you apply generously tend to clump and make a mess, this one doesn't. My lashes look long and full without looking clumpy and like I used a whole container of mascara.

name: mini me
review: I am willing to try other Revlon mascaras due to their high reviews.

name: BoriMakeUpAddict
review: Just bought this today, I've had many mascaras...  up til now doing good. Wasn't sure about the wand at first, but got the hang of it .

name: Susan
review: I bought this product not realizing that it wasn't waterproof.  I have extremely watery eyes, a side effect to a chemotherapy drug.  I wore the mascara one time and quickly had it smudging beneath my eyes and running down my cheeks.  I'm sure it's a terrific product, just not the right one for me.

name: Germica
review: At first I really enjoyed this mascara and was excited about the price. Then I noticed that my own lashes started breaking off. I have only had this product for one week. It's going back to the store.

name: Jen
review: I'm new to the make-up world, but I really like this Mascara. My lashes are definitely well defined. I have naturally long lashes so that may be why they look the same length to me. I had another that I use from time to time, but this one is way better and is now its official replacement.

name: Val the Mom
review: Used once.  Gave it to my daughter.  What a waste

name: Fabulud
review: Amazing product

name: Ish
review: I dont like the wand. Or maybe i just dont know how to use it.

name: sailor woman
review: seems to be very good. i have no lashes and it gives me a little boost.

name: sailor woman
review: it's great for a night out. i don't use mascara a lot but this one works for me

name: Panda
review: When I first put it on, it was a little sticky. Then throughout the day, I noticed that when I blinked a little more at night my lashes would stick together. I did end up sleeping i ln my makeup and had to slowly separate my eyelids because my mascara glued my eyelashes together. I would use this again only if I had a primer or top cost that would prevent this from happening

name: Goya
review: Ah it ok

name: Rg1980
review: About this because it claims to do all of the things that I wanted but when I opened up the mascara the brush was very tiny and it was very difficult to use.  The mascara was clumpy and it didn't add any volume or length

name: Kal981
review: I don't think I've ever left a review for a make-up product before, but I am because this one is terrible. I've never used a flakier mascara before. Yeah, it looks great for about an hour and then all the smudging and flaking. It's not worth the hour of pretty lashes.

name: Amy J
review: This mascara is terribly clumpy!  don't waste your money!

name: Leah
review: The brush is way too small to evenly coat every lash without clumping or weighing down the lashes. The brush is hollow, but I feel like way to much product is on the brush for the size it is.

name: tebbi
review: Good product

name: Sara
review: The applicator cannot be called a brush....it's basically just a piece of plastic.

name: Almost happy
review: I love it up until 8 hrs of use. Unfortunately after 8 hrs of use it begins to crumble and I see particles on top of my cheecks. The other downside is that it's not easy to reapply.

name: Tracy
review: Would not purchase, they missed it with the brush.  Will return for credit.

name: JG
review: Bought this on impulse.  It flaked so bad, I constantly had black bits all over my face.

name: claire
review: Goes on very clumpy and I have to use a brush from another mascara just to comb out the clumps. Definitely does not help with length or volume.

name: Mascara queen
review: In love with this mascara. It lengthens my lashes and makes them look incredible

name: Kate
review:
First thing I noticed was that the brush is very odd. I've tried the mascara 3 times now and I think I've decided that it's too much stress and work to apply daily. I'm a very natural girl when it comes to makeup but for work and going out mascara is a must have. I think it's a very important part to any makeup routine.
With that said, this let me down. Yes the mascara gave me volume.. but that was mainly due to multiple lashes sticking together to look like one. That was a huge problem I had, lashes bunched up together. I was satisfied with the length it gave my lashes but I couldn't get over the appearance of overdone stuck together lashes. With work (a lot of work) I could sometimes pull the lashes a part but that added an extra 10 minutes or so that I don't have time for.
I may try again with this mascara for a night out…. when it's dark, but I will never wear this for work again.
I'm also thinking about trying my favorite mascara brush (which is running out) in this mascara to see if it's just the applicator brush that sucks.

name: cc
review: massacra for eye lashes

name: Smmk
review: I tried this because I read so many great things about it and thought I'd try something new. It's definitely worth a try and I do like it, but I'll be going back to using telescopic.

name: Erinfaye
review: Its clumpy and flakes off during the day.

name: Lori
review: I love the application wand. It is small and allows controlled applocation. Doesn't run,

name: DMac
review: This product is supposed to be an all in one and thought about trying it since it is new on the market. It is sticky from the fiber in the product.  It didn't give me lash length, and it became so clumpy that I had to use a separate mascara to separate my lashes. I was very disappointed.

name: Cindy
review: I have blonde lashes. This is fabulous to darken, appearance of length and volume.

name: RKMAZ
review: The mascara is flaky and I threw it away after one use.  The brush is astonishingly small and making it very difficult to apply the mascara without clumping.

name: Connie
review: The all in one mascara is a great product at reasonable price.  It does not bother my allergies like some mascaras.

name: greenfig
review: i got it specifically just for my bottom lashes. does the trick.

name: Queenieblz
review: Was not happy at all brush was so small no idea how it would even work. To much on the brush it clumped

name: Chickie
review: Terrible product.

name: Steph
review: Awful brush.  Goes on very clumpy.  Will never buy again.

name: 2Beleive33
review: The brush is too small and does not define or lift...I was VERY unsatisfied!

name: 2Beleive33
review: The brush was terrible, not worth using!

name: Erin
review: The applicator is goopy and it goes on your lashes the same way. It is VERY clumpy, the tips flake off, but then what is left is very difficult to remove even with eye make up remover.

name: Kelly
review: Clumpy & flakes fast. I am going to return it.:(

name: KmR
review: This product stinks... it does not add any volume. Also, this mascara does not make your lashes look bigger. Instead, because of the teeny tiny brush you have to go over and over your lashes to even make them look OK. Not great but OK

name: Karen
review: Love the cap. Lets you know it's on tight.

name: Maybelline fan.
review: Worst Mascara ever used. Goes on great , nice coverage when applied, but comes off with any movement, or activity.  Flakes all over my face within hours. No mascara on my lashes within hours. Very disappointed.

name: Gwenifer MUA
review: This brush is bizarre. It's like a little triangle and because the plastic bristles are so small they are worthless. The mascara comes out of the tube thick and goopy and unless you were to wipe the brush with a tissue before applying- which you should not have to do- it just goes on so thick and your lashes stick together. I had to go back over this with another mascara to separate and remove the excess.

name: Andi
review: The brush on this particular formula (red cap) of mascara is so tiny. It's about half the length of an average wand and 2/3 the width. If you have small eyes I suppose this will be great for you, and if you like a natural style this would be right up your alley as well. But the size of the brush makes getting any length, volume or really any noticeable results a time consuming affair.

name: Ivy
review: This brush is worthless! Its tiny and has no bristles to do anything with your eyelashes. Very unhappy and i am a frequent revlon customer!!

name: Kait
review: It's good for changing things up for your average mascara. It's a good natural look but doesn't add a lot of length.

name: Libbie
review: This is one of the worst mascara brushes I've ever used.  The color impact is good, but that is the only positive about this mascara.

name: Payton
review: I was very disappointed, brush is absolutely terrible doesn't do anything promised

name: Mya
review: This product clumps and flakes off. It doesn't even really lengthens my lashes.

name: Rachel
review: The brush is too small and causes the mascara to clump

name: beckysee13
review: The application was really hard to do with such a tiny brush. Too much product clings to the wand, which in turns makes your lashes look clumpy and uneven. I love Revlon... But this was a bust for me.

name: Heidi
review: Amazing

name: universal25
review: I see all of these really bad reviews for this mascara, but I loved it. It is really hard for me to find mascaras that i like, but this is one that I really like. I think the formula is good for the price. The wand is very different from others out there, it gives me really good looking lashes!

name: Heidi
review: Tiny brush u really hAve to wipe the brush off before use

name: Ashlee C.
review: I really like this product. It makes me want to try the other ones in the same line. The only thing is the brush. I love that it spreads evenly and combs through nicely. The size of the brush was a little on the small side but once you get used to it, it's not a problem at all.

name: MJ
review: I've bought this mascara time and time again.

name: PomloveFl
review: I returned this one bc it clumped horribly. I love several of the revlon mascaras, this is the first one that didn't work out for me.

name: Jos
review: Waste of money very pricey but fails to deliver "ultimate all in one" catchy phrase used just to deceive consumers the small brush is a Huge Mistake makes it hard to apply and leaves no visible difference that you had mascara on..Honestly I've seen cheaper mascaras with better qualities than this would advice people Not to buy it too expensive for NOTHING

name: RC
review: I had no idea this was a comb applicator.  It gets product all over my eyelid...very frustrating.

name: Lil Soldier
review: This is the best mascara I've ever used, that actually is true to it's word. I hope you never stop making it.

name: Mary
review: This mascara is so difficult to completely remove. I basically have no lashes left. Do not purchase!

name: Kcan5
review: Good mascara but 5 in 1 effect not impressive

name: Chandra
review:
I was looking to decrease my makeup budget a bit and replacing $20+ tubes of mascara once a month seemed like a good place to cut back. This one caught my eye and I am so thankful it did! I have tried a LOT of mascaras and this one is the only one I would buy twice. It's the only mascara I can still look in the mirror at the end of the day and still be able to tell I have eyelashes. I have straight blonde lashes that even blackened with mascara tend to be pretty invisible because they just go back to straight with most mascara after a short time. This stuff holds my lashes in place after curling and even seems to curl them some on its own if I am in a rush and skip the curler. I often put it on before work, work all day, go to the gym and sweat off every other bit of makeup on my face, then rub my eyes before bed a few times, then forget to remove it and sleep in it. The next morning, it's STILL there... This is the waterproof version, I haven't tried the non-waterproof. On top of all this, my sensitive, watery and dry due to allergies, eyes are not irritated by it in the least. There's a first for everything... So staying power, longer, thicker, curlier lashes as well as actually being able to wear it for more than five minutes. I think I am sold for life... I'm definitely going to have to try the other ones in this line!

Tip: Make sure to wipe off the excess on the brush or it will clump. Especially off of the tip of the brush...

name: Melodytime14
review: I LOVE this mascara. It makes my eyes really pop, and truly does all that it sets out to do. Very easy to apply, and stays on and fresh for about 12 hours.
